alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Travis (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 11 at 4:29AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Travis and northwestern Bastrop Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 429 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Austin Bergstrom Int Airport, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Austin, Elgin, Bastrop, Austin Bergstrom Int Airport, Camp Swift, Wyldwood, Circle D-KC Estates, Hornsby Bend, Webberville, Phelan, Garfield, Maha, Del Valle, Cedar Hills, Butler, Pilot Knob and Bastrop State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
